00016 /*The most common type of incremental encoder uses two output channels (A and B) to sense position.
00017  *  the two output channels of the quadrature encoder indicate both position and direction of rotation.
00018  *  If A leads B, for example, the disk is rotating in a clockwise direction.
00019  *  If B leads A, then the disk is rotating in a counter-clockwise direction.
00020  *  */
